recipesJson.name: Kreed's Kustard
recipesJson.author: Dalpho
recipesJson.description:
One of the best vanilla custards I have ever had. Seriously delicious and smooth at 6 weeks.

Credit: Kevin Reed
Steep: 4-6 weeks but the longer the better!

ELR: http://e-liquid-recipes.com/recipe/429399

reviews.text: Definitely an A+ Custard!!! But more over a definite 6 week steep to get there... If you can wait it's worth it, otherwise don't bother!
